posts.post_content:
Great to see this card in a new frame and with a new art - although the bright sky in this artwork makes it look far less mysterious than Harold McNeil's [original artwork](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=4012), where you instantly felt why you had to pay so much life:  
  
To me it delivered the impression that the library was located in a hidden area deep in the woods, within this big, gnarly, dead tree, which had its entrance at its peak, accessible by climbing up the roots, where this ancient building emitted a magical beacon, which for the most part was the only source of light to brighten up this dim-lit, misty location around the library, only accessible for the chosen elder druids that are in close touch with nature.  
  
Haha, but probably that's just me :D  
Yeong-Hao Han's artwork also has something timeless and mysterious, it's just not as dark and gloomy.

Report Abuse  
Posted By: sanctumaviara (1/15/2013 9:25:42 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
@ sanctumaviara; You get to have 3 lands or non-lands, without discard or paying any life. And that, is awesome.  
  
Since Abundance replaces the draw, and you didn't 'draw' those two cards, there's no reason for you to carry on with the rest of the card's abilities. The last (on 9/16/2007) card ruling speaks to it: "If you choose to draw two cards, then replace one or more of those draws with some other effect, the rest of Sylvan Library's ability still happens. If you've actually drawn only one card that turn, you must choose that card and either pay 4 life or put it on top of your library. If you haven't actually drawn any cards that turn, the rest of the ability has no effect."  
  
You haven't actually *drawn* any cards with abundance, so the rest of the ability has no effect.  
  
So, yeah, @MANABURNWASGOOD, Abundance + Sylvan Library is grrrrreat! As is this card on it's own.

If you've actually drawn only one card that turn, you must choose that card and either pay 4 life or put it on top of your library. If you haven't actually drawn any cards that turn, the rest of the ability has no effect."

You haven't actually drawn any cards with abundance, so the rest of the ability has no effect.

So, yeah, @MANABURNWASGOOD, Abundance + Sylvan Library is grrrrreat! As is this card on it's own.
